name: get_user_info_by_user_id
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool instagram_looter.
Tool description: Access Instagram Data with Precision and Speed! Utilize Intelligent Request Filtering for Guaranteed 99.99% Response.
API description: Fetch Instagram user information by user ID using the RapidAPI service.

is_id.description: The Instagram user ID for which the information is to be fetched.
